title: Is Generative AI Redefining Phishing Tactics in Cybersecurity?
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity, the emergence of generative AI, particularly dark web variants like WormGPT, has cast a looming shadow over the efficacy of traditional defense mechanisms. The potential for cybercriminals to exploit this technology in orchestrating phishing attacks at an unprecedented scale raises concerns about the future of corporate cybersecurity. The intersection ... Read more
